problem.markdown:
>>Long-term capacity: <<
[ ] Is generally influenced by the stochastic fluctuations of one process. [ ] Will change significantly if there is a two-day power outage. [x] Is determined by average resource availability. [x] Dictates the overall production rate of a factory. [x] Is hard to calculate.
[Explanation] See video 6 (slide 49). [Explanation]

checkboxgroup.choice: Is generally influenced by the stochastic fluctuations of one process.
Will change significantly if there is a two-day power outage.
Is determined by average resource availability.
Dictates the overall production rate of a factory.
